definition: mythological bird, reincarnation of drowned daughter Nüwa 女娃[Nu:3 wa2] of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4]
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
Wang Ching-wei (1883-1944), left-wing Guomingdang politician, subsequently Japanese collaborator
lit. mythical bird Jingwei tries to fill the ocean with stones (idiom); futile ambition/task of Sisyphus/determination in the face of impossible odds

sentences.english: Wang Jingwei's political thought was complex and changeful all his life.
sentences.chinese: 汪精卫一生的政治思想复杂而多变。
于是他就把精卫淹死了。

sentences.english: Subordinates are not optimistic about Wang Jingwei to sign the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 下属不看好汪精卫要签的协议。

sentences.english: Thee bird lived on a mountain near the sea.
sentences.chinese: 精卫鸟住在靠海的一座山上。

sentences.english: The bird lived on a mountain near the sea.
sentences.chinese: 精卫鸟住在靠海的一座山上。

sentences.english: After ra period of time, jingwei water to play.
sentences.chinese: 过了一段时间，精卫下水去玩。

sentences.english: Every day, she kept busy picking stones and sticks and threw them into the sea without a stop.
sentences.chinese: 每天，精卫鸟都一刻不停地把石子和树枝扔进海里。

sentences.english: Wang Jingwei put forward his own political view.
sentences.chinese: 汪精卫据此提出自己的政治主张。

sentences.english: Wang himself died of cancer in 1944.
Xue know Wang Jingwei sent the crown of the news.
sentences.chinese: 薛钗知道了汪精卫送皇冠的消息。

sentences.english: After the death of jingwei turned into a bird.
sentences.chinese: 精卫死后，变成了一只小鸟。

sentences.english: Rhododendron Zaibai carefree tears, infinite heart Jingwei reclamation.
sentences.chinese: 杜鹃再拜忧天泪，精卫无穷填海心。

sentences.english: The bird Jingwei hated the sea for claiming her life, and wanted to revenge.
sentences.chinese: 精卫鸟痛恨大海夺去了自己的生命，她想要报仇。

sentences.english: Wang Ching-wei was the head of the pro-Japanese group in the Kuomintang.
sentences.chinese: 汪精卫是当时国民党中亲日派的首领。

sentences.english: Jingwei then left and continued to pick stones and sticks.
sentences.chinese: 精卫离开大海，继续去衔石子和树枝。
